scene_description_enriched: The scene is divided into two parts. On the left, a group of men stand in an outdoor landscape with rolling hills and trees. One man, dressed in white and blue, gestures towards the right. On the right, within an architectural setting, a king is being crowned. He is seated on a throne, wearing a crown and royal robes. Several figures surround him, including one placing a crown on his head and others observing. The inscription above the throne reads "DAVID REX ISRAEL". The floor is tiled in a checkered pattern.
